definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: rebel ? acc. to Thes al. (prob. Aram. loan-word, cf. Aram. srabs contradict, chatter, prattle, tell lies; Pa. [[סְרַב]] and NH Pi. [[סֵרֵב]] = BH; cf. [[סרב]] Sir 41:2 d loving contradiction);—pl. abs. (i.e. [[אִתָּח]]) [[סָרָבִים וְסַלּוֹנִים אוֹתָָח]] Ez Eze 2:6 rebelles et quasi spinae sunt erga te Thes; Vrss rd. ptcp., Co Berthol [[סׂרְבִים וְסׂלִים]] resisting and despising thee (cf. [[סַלּוֹן]]); AV RV briers and thorns cf. Ew Hi-Sm Siegf:Kau Da Toy.
